martha.title: Martha @ Bridgeport Village
martha.bio: Martha is a delightful collaboration from returning Piano. Push. Play. artists Lettie Jane Rennekamp , Cassandra Swan, and Michael Buchino.  Open during business hours.

gaga.title: Gaga @ The Q Center
gaga.bio: This rainbow-colored beauty springs forth from the wonderful Wokeface. Open during business hours.

idil.title: Idil @ The Portland Art Museum
idil.bio: The always delightful Julz Nally created this piano, waiting for you at our premier location. Open during business hours.

cristine.title: Cristine @ The Children's Museum
cristine.bio: This piano is a delight! Come out to the Children's Museum to play and bring your friends. Open during business hours.

stevie.title: Stevie @ Doug Fir Lounge
stevie.bio: This piano, decorated by the team at Doug Fir, represents all the great bands that have played there. Open during business hours.

maria.title: Maria @ Society Hotel Roof
maria.bio: Up on the roof, in the Summer air, find this wonderful piano with a timely message. Open during business hours.

ray.title: Ray @ 13th & Burnside
ray.bio: Designer Vania Vananina's vibrant piano, named for Ray Charles, is out on the street at our original location.

annie.title: Annie @ Cartlandia
annie.bio: Designer Deadstock Coffee gives us this simple piano at Cartlandia. Go play it! Open during business hours.

cecile.title: CÃ©cile @ Rose Festival Patio
cecile.bio: The team at Sera Architects gives us this classy multi-layered number at a favorite location, on the riverside plaza just south of the Salmon Street Springs fountain.
